juzs.text: Tarapara ami tara sampradayera upara akasa theke kona bahini abatirna karini ebam ami (bahini) abataranakari'o na.
Bastutah e chila eka mahanada. Atahpara sange sange saba'i stad'dha haye gela.
Bandadera jan'ye aksepa ye, tadera kache emana kona rasula'i agamana kareni yadera prati tara bidrupa kare na.
Tara ki pratyaksa kare na, tadera purbe ami kata sampradayake dhbansa karechi ye, tara tadera madhye ara phire asabe na.
Odera saba'ike samabeta abasthaya amara darabare upasthita hate'i habe.
Tadera jan'ye ekati nidarsana mrta prthibi. Ami eke sanjibita kari ebam ta theke utpanna kari sasya, tara ta theke bhaksana kare.
Ami tate srsti kari khejura o angurera bagana ebam prabahita kari tate nirjharini.
Yate tara tara phala khaya. Tadera hata eke srsti kare na. Atahpara tara krtajnata prakasa kare na kena
pabitra tini yini yamina theke utpanna udbhidake, tadera'i manusake ebam ya tara jane na, tara pratyekake jora jora kare srsti karechena.
Tadera jan'ye eka nidarsana ratri, ami ta theke dinake apasarita kari, takhana'i tara andhakare theke yaya.
Surya tara nirdista abasthane abartana kare. Eta parakramasali, sarbajna, allahara niyantrana.
Candrera jan'ye ami bibhinna manayila nirdharita karechi. Abasese se puratana kharjura sakhara anurupa haye yaya.
Surya nagala pete pare na candrera ebam ratri agre cale na dinera pratyeke'i apana apana kaksapathe santarana kare.
Tadera jan'ye ekati nidarsana e'i ye, ami tadera santana-santatike bojha'i naukaya arohana kariyechi.
Ebam tadera jan'ye naukara anurupa yanabahana srsti karechi, yate tara arohana kare.
Ami iccha karale taderake nimajjata karate pari, takhana tadera jan'ye kona sahayyakari ne'i ebam tara paritrana'o pabe na.
Kintu amara'i paksa theke krpa ebam taderake kichu kala jibanopabhoga karara suyoga deyara karane ta kari na.
Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, tomara samanera ayaba o pechanera ayabake bhaya kara, yate tomadera prati anugraha kara haya, takhana tara ta agrahya kare.
Yakhana'i tadera palanakartara nirdesabalira madhye theke kona nirdesa tadera kache ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukhe phiriye neya.

Yakhana taderake bala haya, allaha tomaderake ya diyechena, ta theke byaya kara. Takhana kapherara muminaganake bale, iccha karale'i allaha yake kha'oyate paratena, amara take kena kha'oyaba? Tomara to spasta bibhrantite patita rayecha.
Tara bale, tomara satyabadi hale bala e'i oyada kabe purna habe
tara kebala ekata bhayabaha sabdera apeksa karache, ya taderake aghata karabe tadera parasparika bakabitandakale.
Takhana tara ochiyata karate'o saksama habe na. Ebam tadera paribara-parijanera kache'o phire yete parabe na.
Singaya phumka deya habe, takhana'i tara kabara theke tadera palanakartara dike chute calabe.
Tara balabe, haya amadera durbhoga! Ke amaderake nidrasthala theke ukhita karala? Rahamana allaha to era'i oyada diyechilena ebam rasulagana satya balechilena.
Eta to habe kebala eka mahanada. Se muhurte'i tadera saba'ike amara samane upasthita kara habe.
Ajakera dine kara'o prati juluma kara habe na ebam tomara ya karabe kebala tara'i pratidana pabe.
Edina jannatira anande masagula thakabe.
Tara ebam tadera strira upabista thakabe chayamaya paribese asane helana diye.
Sekhane tadera jan'ye thakabe phala-mula ebam ya ca'ibe.
Karunamaya palanakartara paksa theke taderake bala habe salama.
He aparadhira! Aja tomara alada haye ya'o.
He bani-adama! Ami ki tomaderake bale rakhini ye, sayatanera ebadata karo na, se tomadera prakasya satru
ebam amara ebadata kara. Eta'i sarala patha.
Sayatana tomadera aneka dalake pathabhrasta kareche. Tabu'o ki tomara bujhani
e'i se jahannama, yara oyada tomaderake deya hato.
Tomadera kupharera karane aja ete prabesa kara.
Aja ami tadera mukhe mohara emte deba tadera hata amara sathe katha balabe ebam tadera pa tadera krtakarmera saksya debe.
Ami iccha karale tadera drsti sakti bilupta kare dite paratama, takhana tara pathera dike daurate ca'ile kemana kare dekhate peta
ami iccha karale taderake sba sba sthane akara bikrta karate paratama, phale tara age'o calate parata na ebam pechane'o phire yete parata na.
Ami yake dirgha jibana dana kari, take srstigata purbabasthaya phiriye ne'i. Tabu'o ki tara bujhe na
ami rasulake kabita siksa de'ini ebam ta tara jan'ye sobhaniya'o naya. Eta to eka upadesa o prakasya kora'ana.
Yate tini satarka karena jibitake ebam yate kapheradera birud'dhe abhiyoga pratisthita haya.
Tara ki dekhe na, tadera jan'ye ami amara nija hatera tairi bastura dbara catuspada jantu srsti karechi, atahpara tara'i egulora malika.
Ami eguloke tadera hate asahaya kare diyechi. Phale edera kataka tadera bahana ebam kataka tara bhaksana kare.
Tadera jan'ye catuspada jantura madhye aneka upakarita o paniya rayeche. Tabu'o kena tara sukariya adaya kare na
tara allahara paribarte aneka upasya grahana kareche yate tara sahayyaprapta hate pare.
Athaca esaba upasya taderake sahayya karate saksama habe na ebam egulo tadera bahini rupe dhrta haye asabe.
Ata'eba tadera katha yena apanake duhkhita na kare. Ami jani ya tara gopane kare ebam ya tara prakasye kare.
Manusa ki dekhe na ye, ami take srsti karechi birya theke? Atahpara takhana'i se haye gela prakasya bakabitandakari.
Se amara samparke eka adbhuta katha barnana kare, athaca se nijera srsti bhule yaya. Se bale ke jibita karabe asthisamuhake yakhana segulo pace gale yabe
baluna, yini prathamabara seguloke srsti karechena, tini'i jibita karabena. Tini sarbaprakara srsti samparke samyaka abagata.
Yini tomadera jan'ye sabuja brksa theke aguna utpanna karena. Takhana tomara ta theke aguna jbala'o.
Yini nabhomandala o bhumandala srsti karechena, tini'i ki tadera anurupa srsti karate saksama nana? Hyam tini mahasrasta, sarbajna.
Tini yakhana kona kichu karate iccha karena, takhana take kebala bale dena, ‘ha'o’ takhana'i ta haye yaya.
Ata'eba pabitra tini, yamra hate sabakichura rajatba ebam tamra'i dike tomara pratyabartita habe.
Sapatha tadera yara saribad'dha haye damrano
atahpara dhamakiye bhiti pradarsanakaridera
atahpara mukhastha abrttikaridera
niscaya tomadera mabuda eka.
Tini asamana samuha, yamina'o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichura palanakarta ebam palanakarta udayacalasamuhera.
Niscaya ami nikatabarti akasake tarakarajira dbara susobhita karechi.
Ebam take sanraksita karechi pratyeka abadhya sayatana theke.
Ora urdhba jagatera kona kichu srabana karate pare na ebam cara dika theke tadera prati ulka niksepa kara haya.
Oderake bitaranera uddese. Odera jan'ye rayeche biramahina sasti.
Tabe ke'u chom mere kichu sune phelale jbalanta ulkapinda tara pascad'dhabana kare.
Apani taderake jijnesa karuna, taderake srsti kara kathinatara, na ami an'ya ya srsti karechi? Ami'i taderake srsti karechi emtela mati theke.
Baram apani bismaya bodha karena ara tara bidrupa kare.
Yakhana taderake bojhano haya, takhana tara bojhe na.
Tara yakhana kona nidarsana dekhe takhana bidrupa kare.
Ebam bale, kichu'i naya, eye spasta yadu.
Amara yakhana mare yaba, ebam mati o hare parinata haye yaba, takhana'o ki amara punarut'thita haba
amadera pitrpurusagana'o ki
baluna, hyam ebam tomara habe lanchita.
Bastutah se ut'thana habe ekati bikata sabda matra-yakhana tara pratyaksa karate thakabe.
Ebam balabe, durbhagya amadera! Eta'i to pratiphala dibasa.
Bala habe, eta'i phayasalara dina, yake tomara mithya balate.
Ekatrita kara gonahagaraderake, tadera dosaraderake ebam yadera ebadata tara karata.
Allaha byatita. Atahpara taderake paricalita kara jahannamera pathe
ebam taderake thama'o, tara jijnasita habe
tomadera ki hala ye, tomara eke aparera sahayya karacha na
baram tara ajakera dine atnasamarpanakari.
Tara eke aparera dike mukha kare parasparake jijnasabada karabe.
Balabe, tomara to amadera kache dana dika theke asate.
Tara balabe, baram tomara to bisbasi'i chile na.
Ebam tomadera upara amadera kona katrtba chila na, baram tomara'i chile simalanghanakari sampradaya.
Amadera bipakse amadera palanakartara ukti'i satya hayeche. Amaderake abasa'i sbada asbadana karate habe.
Amara tomaderake pathabhrasta karechilama. Karana amara nijera'i pathabhrasta chilama.
Tara saba'i sedina santite sarika habe.
Aparadhidera sathe ami emani byabahara kare thaki.
Tadera yakhana bala hata, allaha byatita kona upasya ena'i, takhana tara aud'dhatya pradarsana karata.
Ebam balata, amara ki eka um'mada kabira kathaya amadera upasyaderake parityaga karaba.
Na, tini satyasaha agamana karechena ebam rasulaganera satyata sbikara karechena.
Tomara abasya'i bedanadayaka sasti asbadana karabe.
Tomara ya karate, tara'i pratiphala pabe.
Tabe tara naya, yara allahara bacha'i kara banda.
Tadera jan'ye rayeche nirdharita ruyi.
Phala-mula ebam tara sam'manita.
Neyamatera udyanasamuha.
Mukhomukhi haye asane asina.
Taderake ghure phire paribesana kara habe sbaccha panapatra.
Susubhra, ya panakaridera jan'ye susbadu.
Tate matha byathara upadana ne'i ebam tara ta pana kare matala'o habe na.
Tadera kache thakabe nata, ayatalocana tarunigana.
Yena tara suraksita dima.
Atahpara tara eke aparera dike mukha kare jijnasabada karabe.
Tadera ekajana balabe, amara eka sangi chila.
Se balata, tumi ki bisbasa kara ye
Amara yakhana mare yaba ebam mati o hare parinata haba, takhana'o ki amara pratiphala prapta haba
allaha balabena, tomara ki take uki diye dekhate ca'o
apara se uki diye dekhabe ebam take jahannamera majhakhane dekhate pabe.
Se balabe, allahara kasama, tumi to amake praya dhbansa'i kare diyechile.
Amara palanakartara anugraha na hale ami'o ye grephatarakrtadera sathe'i upasthita hatama.
Ekhana amadera ara mrtyu habe na.
Amadera prathama mrtyu chara ebam amara sasti prapta'o haba na.
Niscaya e'i maha saphalya.
Emana saphalyera jan'ye parisramidera parisrama kara ucita.
E'i ki uttama apyayana, na yakkuma brksa
ami yalemadera jan'ye eke bipada karechi.
Eti ekati brksa, ya udagata haya jahannamera mule.
Era guccha sayatanera mastakera mata.
Kapherara eke bhaksana karabe ebam era dbara udara purna karabe.
Tadupari taderake deya habe. Phutanta panira misrana
atahpara tadera pratyabartana habe jahannamera dike.
Tara tadera purbapurusaderake peyechila bipathagami.
Atahpara tara tadera padanka anusarane tatpara chila.
Tadera purbe'o agrabartidera adhikansa bipathagami hayechila.
Ami tadera madhye bhiti pradarsanakari prerana karechilama.
Ata'eba laksya karuna, yaderake bhitipradarsana kara hayechila, tadera parinati ki hayeche.
Tabe allahara bacha'i kara bandadera katha bhinna.
Ara nuha amake dekechila. Ara ki camatkarabhabe ami tara dake sara diyechilama.
Ami take o tara paribarabargake eka mahasankata theke raksa karechilama.
Ebam tara bansadharaderake'i ami abasista rekhechilama.
Ami tara jan'ye parabartidera madhye e bisaya rekhe diyechi ye
bisbabasira madhye nuhera prati santi barsita hoka.
Ami ebhabe'i satkarma parayanaderake puraskrta kare thaki.
Se chila amara imanadara bandadera an'yatama.
Atahpara ami aparapara saba'ike nimajjata karechilama.
Ara nuha panthidera'i ekajana chila ibrahima.
Yakhana se tara palanakartara nikata susthu citte upasthita hayechila
yakhana se tara pita o sampradayake balechilah tomara kisera upasana karacha
tomara ki allaha byatita mithya upasya kamana karacha
bisbajagatera palanakarta samparke tomadera dharana ki
atahpara se ekabara tarakadera prati laksya karala.
Ebam balalah ami pirita.
Atahpara tara tara prati pitha phiriye cale gela.
Atahpara se tadera debalaye, giye dhukala ebam balalah tomara khaccha na kena
tomadera ki hala ye, katha balacha na
atahpara se prabala aghate tadera upara jhampiye parala.
Takhana lokajana tara dike chute elo bhita-santrasta pade.
Se balalah tomara sbahasta nirmita patharera puja kara kena
athaca allaha tomaderake ebam tomara ya nirmana karacha saba'ike srsti karechena.
Tara balalah era jan'ye ekati bhita nirmana kara ebam atahpara take agunera stupe niksepa kara.
Tarapara tara tara birud'dhe maha sarayantra amtate ca'ila, kintu ami taderake'i parabhuta kare dilama.
Se balalah ami amara palanakartara dike calalama, tini amake pathapradarsana karabena.
He amara para'oyaradegara! Amake eka satputra dana kara.
Sutaram ami take eka sahanasila putrera susambada dana karalama.

Atahpara se yakhana pitara sathe calaphera karara bayase upanita hala, takhana ibrahima take balalah batsa! Ami sbapne dekhiye, tomake yabeha karachi; ekhana tomara abhimata ki dekha. Se balalah pitah! Apanake ya adesa kara hayeche, ta'i karuna. Allaha cahe to apani amake sabarakari pabena.
Yakhana pita-putra ubhaye'i anugatya prakasa karala ebam ibrahima take yabeha karara jan'ye sayita karala.
Takhana ami take deke balalamah he ibrahima
tumi to sbapnake satye parinata kare dekhale! Ami ebhabe'i satkarmiderake pratidana diye thaki.
Niscaya eta eka suspasta pariksa.
Ami tara paribarte dilama yabeha karara jan'ye eka mahana jantu.
Ami tara jan'ye e bisayati parabartidera madhye rekhe diyechi ye
ibrahimera prati salama barsita hoka.
Emanibhabe ami satkarmiderake pratidana diye thaki.
Se chila amara bisbasi bandadera ekajana.
Ami take susambada diyechi isahakera, se satkarmidera madhya theke ekajana nabi.
Take ebam isahakake ami barakata dana karechi. Tadera bansadharadera madhye kataka satkarmi ebam kataka nijedera upara spasta julumakari.
Ami anugraha karechilama musa o harunera prati.
Taderake o tadera sampradayake ud'dhara karechi maha sankata theke.
Ami taderake sahayya karechilama, phale tara'i chila bijayi.
Ami ubhayake diyechilama suspasta kitaba.
Ebam taderake sarala patha pradarsana karechilama.
Ami tadera jan'ye parabartidera madhye e bisaya rekhe diyechi ye
musa o harunera prati salama barsita hoka.
Ebhabe ami satkarmiderake pratidana diye thaki.
Tara ubhaye'i chila amara bisbasi bandadera an'yatama.
Niscaya'i iliyasa chila rasula.
Yakhana se tara sampradayake balalah tomara ki bhaya kara na
tomara ki ba’ala debatara ebadata karabe ebam sarbottama srastake parityaga karabe.
Yini allaha tomadera palanakarta ebam tomadera purbapurusadera palanakarta
atahpara tara take mithya pratipanna karala. Ata'eba tara abasya'i grephatara haye asabe.
Kintu allaha ta’alara khamti bandagana naya.
Ami tara jan'ye parabartidera madhye e bisaye rekhe diyechi ye
iliyasera prati salama barsita hoka
ebhabe'i ami satkarmiderake pratidana diye thaki.
Se chila amara bisbasi bandadera antarbhukta.
Niscaya luta chilena rasulaganera ekajana.
Yakhana ami take'o tara paribarera saba'ike ud'dhara karechilama
kintu eka brd'dhake chara; se an'yan'yadera sange theke giyechila.
Atahpara abasistaderake ami samule utpatita karechilama.
Tomara tomadera dhbansa stupera upara diye gamana kara bhora belaya
ebam sandhyaya, tara pare'o ki tomara bojha na
ara i'unusa'o chilena payagambaraganera ekajana.
Yakhana paliye tini bojha'i naukaya giye paumchechilena.
Atahpara latari (surati) karale tini dosi sabyasta halena.
Atahpara ekati macha tamke gile phelala, takhana tini aparadhi ganya hayechilena.
Yadi tini allahara tasabiha patha na karatena
tabe tamke keyamata dibasa paryanta machera pete'i thakate hata.
Atahpara ami tamke eka bistirna-bijana prantare niksepa karalama, takhana tini chilena rugna.
Ami tamra upara eka latabisista brksa udagata karalama.
Ebam tamke, laksa ba tatodhika lokera prati prerana karalama.
Tara bisbasa sthapana karala atahpara ami taderake nirdharita samaya paryanta jibanopabhoga karate dilama.
Ebara taderake jijnesa karuna, tomara palanakartara jan'ye ki kan'ya santana rayeche ebam tadera jan'ye ki putra-santana.
Na ki ami tadera upasthitite pheresataganake narirupe srsti karechi
jeno, tara managara ukti kare ye
allaha santana janma diyechena. Niscaya tara mithyabadi.
Tini ki putra-santanera sthale kan'ya-santana pachanda karechena
tomadera ki hala? Tomadera e kemana sindhanta
tomara ki anudhabana kara na
na ki tomadera kache suspasta kona dalila rayeche
tomara satyabadi hale tomadera kitaba ana.
Tara allaha o jbinadera madhye samparka sabyasta kareche, athaca jbinera jane ye, tara grephatara haye asabe.
Tara ya bale ta theke allaha pabitra.
Tabe yara allahara nisthabana banda, tara grephatara haye asabe na.
Ata'eba tomara ebam tomara yadera upasana kara
tadera ka'uke'i tomara allaha samparke bibhranta karate parabe na.
Sudhumatra tadera chara yara jahanname pauchabe.
Amadera pratyekera jan'ya rayeche nirdista sthana.
Ebam amara'i saribad'dhabhabe dandayamana thaki.
Ebam amara'i allahara pabitrata ghosana kari.
Tara to balatah
yadi amadera kache purbabartidera kona upadesa thakata
tabe amara abasya'i allahara manonita banda hatama.
Bastutah tara e'i kora'anake asbikara kareche. Ekhana sighra'i tara jene nite parabe
amara rasula o bandaganera byapare amara e'i bakya satya hayeche ye
abasya'i tara sahayya prapta haya.
Ara amara bahini'i haya bijayi.
Ata'eba apani kichukalera jan'ye taderake upeksa karuna.
Ebam taderake dekhate thakuna. Sighra'i tara'o era parinama dekhe nebe.
Amara ayaba ki tara druta kamana kare
atahpara yakhana tadera anginaya ayaba nayila habe, takhana yaderake satarka kara hayechila, tadera sakala belati habe khuba'i manda.
Apani kichukalera jan'ye taderake upeksa karuna.
Ebam dekhate thakuna, sighra'i tara'o era parinama dekhe nebe.
Pabitra apanara para'oyaradegarera satta, tini sam'manita o pabitra ya tara barnana kare ta theke.
Payagambaraganera prati salama barsita hoka.
Samasta prasansa bisbapalaka allahara nimitta.
Choyada. Sapatha upadesapurna kora'anera
baram yara kaphera, tara ahankara o birodhitaya lipta.
Tadera age ami kata janagosthike dhbansa karechi, atahpara tara artanada karate suru kareche kintu tadera niskrti labhera samaya chila na.
Tara bismayabodha kare ye, tadera'i kache tadera madhye theke ekajana satarkakari agamana karechena. Ara kapherara bale e-to eka mithyacari yadukara.
Se ki bahu upasyera paribarte eka upasyera upasana sabyasta kare diyeche. Niscaya eta eka bismayakara byapara.
Tadera katipaya bisista byakti ekatha bale prasthana kare ye, tomara cale ya'o ebam tomadera upasyadera pujaya drrha thaka. Niscaya'i e baktabya kona bisesa uddesye pranodita.
Amara sabeka dharme e dharanera katha sunini. Eta managara byapara bai naya.
Amadera madhya theke sudhu ki tara'i prati upadesa bani abatirna hala? Bastutah ora amara upadesa samparke sandihana; baram ora ekhana'o amara mara asbadana kareni.
Na ki tadera kache apanara parakranta dayabana palanakartara rahamatera kona bhandara rayeche
naki nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichura upara tadera samrajya rayeche? Thakale tadera akase arohana kara ucita rasi jhuliye.
Eksetre bahu bahinira madhye odera'o eka bahini ache, ya parajita habe.
Tadera purbe'o mithyaropa karechila nuhera sampradaya, ada, kilaka bisista phera'una
samuda, lutera sampradaya o a'ikara lokera. Era'i chila bahu bahini.
Edera pratyeke'i payagambaraganera prati mithyaropa kareche. Phale amara ayaba pratisthita hayeche.
Kebala ekati mahanadera apeksa karache, yate dama phelara abakasa thakabe na.
Tara bale, he amadera para'oyaradegara, amadera prapya ansa hisaba dibasera age'i diye da'o.
Tara ya bale tate apani sabara karuna ebam amara saktisali banda da'udake smarana karuna. Se chila amara prati pratyabartanasila.
Ami parbatamalake tara anugami kare diyechilama, tara sakala-sandhyaya tara sathe pabitrata ghosana karata
ara paksikulake'o, yara tara kache samabeta hata. Saba'i chila tamra prati pratyabartanasila.
Ami tamra samrajyake sudrrha karechilama ebam tamke diyechilama prajna o phayasalakari bagnita.
Apanara kache dabidaradera brttanta paucheche, yakhana tara pracira dingiye ebadata khanaya prabesa karechila.

Yakhana tara da'udera kache anuprabesa karala, takhana se santrasta haye parala. Tara balalah bhaya karabena na; amara bibadamana duti paksa, eke aparera prati barabari karechi. Ata'eba, amadera madhye n'yayabicara karuna, abicara karabena na. Amaderake sarala patha pradarsana karuna.
Se amara bha'i, se niranabba'i dumbara malika ara ami malika ekati madi dumbara. Erapara'o se baleh eti'o amake diye da'o. Se kathabartaya amara upara bala prayoga kare.

Da'uda balalah se tomara dumbatike nijera dumbagulora sathe sanyukta karara dabi kare tomara prati abicara kareche. Sarikadera aneke'i eke aparera prati juluma kare thake. Tabe tara kare na, yara allahara prati bisbasi o satkarma sampadanakari. Abasya emana lokera sankhya alpa. Da'udera kheyala hala ye, ami take pariksa karachi. Atahpara se tara palanakartara kache ksama prarthana karala, sejadaya lutiye parala ebam tamra dike pratyabartana karala.
Ami tara se aparadha ksama karalama. Niscaya amara kache tara jan'ye rayeche ucca martaba o sundara abasasthala.

He da'uda! Ami tomake prthibite pratinidhi karechi, ata'eba, tumi manusera majhe n'yayasangatabhabe rajatba kara ebam kheyala-khusira anusarana karo na. Ta tomake allahara patha theke bicyuta kare debe. Niscaya yara allahara patha theke bicyuta haya, tadera jan'ye rayeche kathora sasti, e karane ye, tara hisabadibasake bhule yaya.
Ami asamana-yamina o etadubhayera madhyabarti kona kichu ayatha srsti karini. Eta kapheradera dharana. Ata'eba, kapheradera jan'ye rayeche durbhoga arthat jahannama.
Ami ki bisbasi o satkarmiderake prthibite biparyaya srstikari kapheradera samatulya kare deba? Na khodabhiruderake papacaridera sam'mana kare deba.
Eti ekati barakatamaya kitaba, ya ami apanara prati barakata hisebe abatirna karechi, yate manusa era ayatasuha laksya kare ebam bud'dhimanagana yena ta anudhabana kare.
Ami da'udake solayamana dana karechi. Se ekajana uttama banda. Se chila pratyabartanasila.
Yakhana tara samane aparahne utkrsta asbaraji pesa kara hala
takhana se balalah ami to amara para'oyaradegarera smarane bismrta haye sampadera mahabbate mugdha haye parechi-emanaki surya dube geche.
Eguloke amara kache phiriye ana. Atahpara se tadera pa o galadesa chedana karate suru karala.
Ami solayamanake pariksa karalama ebam rekhe dilama tara sinhasanera upara ekati nisprana deha. Atahpara se ruju hala.
Solayamana balalah he amara palanakarta, amake mapha karuna ebam amake emana samrajya dana karuna ya amara pare ara ke'u pete parabe na. Niscaya apani mahadata.
Takhana ami batasake tara anugata kare dilama, ya tara hukume abadhe prabahita hata yekhane se pauchate ca'ita.
Ara sakala sayatanake tara adhina kare dilama arthat, yara chila prasada nirmanakari o duburi.
Ebam an'ya ara'o anekake adhina kare dilama, yara abad'dha thakata srnkhale.
Egulo amara anugraha, ata'eba, egulo ka'uke da'o athaba nije rekhe da'o-era kona hiseba dite habe na.
Niscaya tara jan'ye amara kache rayeche maryada o subha parinati.
Smarana karuna, amara banda a'iyyubera katha, yakhana se tara palanakartake ahabana kare balalah sayatana amake yantrana o kasta pauchiyeche.
Tumi tomara pa diye bhumite aghata kara. Jharana nirgata hala gosala karara jan'ye sitala o pana karara jan'ye.
Ami take dilama tara parijanabarga o tadera mata ara'o aneka amara paksa theke rahamatasbarupa ebam bud'dhimanadera jan'ye upadesasbarupa.
Tumi tomara hate eka mutho trnasala na'o, tadbara aghata kara ebam sapatha bhanga karo na. Ami take pelama sabarakari. Camatkara banda se. Niscaya se chila pratyabartanasila.
Smarana karuna, hata o cokhera adhikari amara banda ibrahima, isahaka o iyakubera katha.
Ami tadera eka bisesa guna tatha parakalera smarana dbara sbatantrya dana karechilama.
Ara tara amara kache manonita o satlokadera antarbhukta.
Smarana karuna, isama'ila, ala iyasa o yulakiphalera katha. Tara pratyeke'i gunijana.
E eka mahat alocana. Khodabhirudera jan'ye rayeche uttama thikana
tatha sthayi basabasera jannata; tadera jan'ye tara dbara um'mukta rayeche.
Sekhane tara helana diye basabe. Tara sekhane ca'ibe aneka phala-mula o paniya.
Tadera kache thakabe anatanayana samabayaska ramanigana.
Tomaderake era'i pratisruti deya hacche bicara dibasera jan'ye.
Eta amara deya riyika ya sesa habe na.
Etato sunale, ekhana dustadera jan'ye rayeche nikrsta thikana
tatha jahannama. Tara sekhane prabesa karabe. Ata'eba, kata nikrsta se'i abasa sthala.
Eta uttapta pani o pamuja; ata'eba tara eke asbadana karuka.
E dharanera ara'o kichu sasti ache.
E'i to ekadala tomadera sathe prabesa karache. Tadera jan'ye abhinandana ne'i tara to jahanname prabesa karabe.
Tara balabe, tomadera jan'ye o to abhinandana ne'i. Tomara'i amaderake e bipadera sam'mukhina karecha. Ata'eba, eti kata'i na ghrnya abasasthala.
Tara balabe, he amadera palanakarta, ye amaderake era sam'mukhina kareche, apani jahanname tara sasti dbiguna kare dina.
Tara ara'o balabe, amadera ki hala ye, amara yaderake manda loka bale ganya karatama, taderake ekhane dekhachi na.
Amara ki ahetuka taderake thattara patra kare niyechilama, na amadera drsti bhula karache
Eta arthat jahannamidera parasparika baka-bitanda abasyambhabi.
Baluna, ami to ekajana satarkakari matra ebam eka parakramasali allaha byatita kona upasya ne'i.
Tini asamana-yamina o etadubhayera madhyabarti saba kichura palanakarta, parakramasali, marjanakari.
Baluna, eti eka mahasambada
ya theke tomara mukha phiriye niyecha.
Urdhba jagat samparke amara kona jnana chila na yakhana pheresatara kathabarta balachila.
Amara kache e ohi'i ase ye, ami ekajana spasta satarkakari.
Yakhana apanara palanakarta pheresataganake balalena, ami matira manusa srsti karaba.
Yakhana ami take susama karaba ebam tate amara ruha phumke deba, takhana tomara tara sam'mukhe sejadaya nata haye yeyo.
Atahpara samasta pheresata'i ekayoge sejadaya nata hala
kintu ibalisa; se ahankara karala ebam asbikarakaridera antarbhukta haye gela.
Allaha balalena, he ibalisa, ami sbahaste yake srsti karechi, tara sam'mukhe sejada karate tomake kise badha dila? Tumi ahankara karale, na tumi tara ceye ucca maryada sampanna
se balalah ami tara ceye uttama apani amake agunera dbara srsti karechena, ara take srsti karechena matira dbara.
Allaha balalenah bera haye ya, ekhana theke. Karana, tu'i abhisapta.
Tora prati amara e abhisapa bicara dibasa paryanta sthayi habe.
Se balalah he amara palanakarta, apani amake punarut'thana dibasa paryanta abakasa dina.
Alla'aha balalenah toke abakasa deya hala.
Se samayera dina paryanta ya jana.
Se balala, apanara iyayatera kasama, ami abasya'i tadera saba'ike bipathagami kare deba.
Tabe tadera madhye yara apanara khamti banda, taderake chara.
Allaha balalenah ta'i thika, ara ami satya balachi
tora dbara ara tadera madhye yara tora anusarana karabe tadera dbara ami jahannama purna karaba.
Baluna, ami tomadera kache kona pratidana ca'i na ara ami laukikatakari'o na'i.
Eta to bisbabasira jan'ye eka upadesa matra.
Tomara kichu kala pare era sambada abasya'i janate parabe.
Kitaba abatirna hayeche parakramasali, prajnamaya allahara paksa theke.
Ami apanara prati e kitaba yathartharupe nayila karechi. Ata'eba, apani nisthara sathe allahara ebadata karuna.

Jene rakhuna, nisthapurna ebadata allahara'i nimitta. Yara allaha byatita aparake upasyarupe grahana kare rekheche ebam bale ye, amara tadera ebadata e jan'ye'i kari, yena tara amaderake allahara nikatabarti kare deya. Niscaya allaha tadera madhye tadera parasparika birodhapurna bisayera phayasala kare debena. Allaha mithyabadi kapherake satpathe paricalita karena na.
Allaha yadi santana grahana karara iccha karatena, tabe tamra srstira madhya theke ya kichu iccha manonita karatena, tini pabitra. Tini allaha, eka parakramasali.

Tini asamana o yamina srsti karechena yathayathabhabe. Tini ratrike dibasa dbara acchadita karena ebam dibasake ratri dbara acchadita karena ebam tini surya o candrake kaje niyukta karechena pratyeke'i bicarana kare nirdista samayakala paryanta. Jene rakhuna, tini parakramasali, ksamasila.

Tini srsti karechena tomaderake eka'i byakti theke. Atahpara ta theke tara yugala srsti karechena ebam tini tomadera jan'ye ata prakara catuspada jantu abatirna karechena. Tini tomaderake srsti karechena tomadera matrgarbhe paryayakrame ekera para eka tribidha andhakare. Tini allaha tomadera palanakarta, samrajya tamra'i. Tini byatita kona upasya ne'i. Ata'eba, tomara kothaya bibhranta haccha

Yadi tomara asbikara kara, tabe allaha tomadera theke bepara'oya. Tini tamra bandadera kaphera haye para pachanda karena na. Paksantare yadi tomara krtajna ha'o, tabe tini tomadera jan'ye ta pachanda karena. Ekera papa bhara an'ye bahana karabe na. Atahpara tomara tomadera palanakartara kache phire yabe. Tini tomaderake tomadera karma sambandhe abahita karabena. Niscaya tini antarera bisaya samparke'o abagata.

Yakhana manusake duhkha-kasta sparsa kare, takhana se ekagracitte tara palanakartake dake, atahpara tini yakhana take neyamata dana karena, takhana se kastera katha bismrta haye yaya, yara jan'ye purbe dekechila ebam allahara samakaksa sthira kare; yate kare aparake allahara patha theke bibhranta kare. Baluna, tumi tomara kuphara sahakare kichukala jibanopabhoga kare na'o. Niscaya tumi jahannamidera antarbhukta.

Ye byakti ratrikale sejadara madhyame athaba damriye ebadata kare, parakalera asanka rakhe ebam tara palanakartara rahamata pratyasa kare, se ki tara samana, ye erupa kare na; baluna, yara jane ebam yara jane na; tara ki samana hate pare? Cinta-bhabana kebala tara'i kare, yara bud'dhimana.

Baluna, he amara bisbasi bandagana! Tomara tomadera palanakartake bhaya kara. Yara e duniyate satkaja kare, tadera jan'ye rayeche punya. Allahara prthibi prasasta. Yara sabarakari, tara'i tadera puraskara paya aganita.
Baluna, ami nisthara sathe allahara ebadata karate adista hayechi.
Ara'o adista hayechi, sarba prathama nirdesa palanakari ha'oyara jan'ye.
Baluna, ami amara palanakartara abadhya hale eka mahadibasera sastira bhaya kari.
Baluna, ami nisthara sathe allaha ta’alara'i ebadata kari.

Ata'eba, tomara allahara paribarte yara iccha tara ebadata kara. Baluna, keyamatera dina tara'i besi ksatigrasta habe, yara nijedera o paribarabargera tarapha theke ksatigrasta habe. Jene rakha, eta'i suspasta ksati.
Tadera jan'ye upara dika theke ebam nicera dika theke agunera meghamala thakabe. E sasti dbara allaha tamra bandaderake satarka karena ye, he amara bandagana, amake bhaya kara.
Yara sayatani saktira puja-arcana theke dure thake ebam allaha abhimukhi haya, tadera jan'ye rayeche susambada. Ata'eba, susambada dina amara bandaderake.
Yara manonibesa sahakare katha sune, atahpara ya uttama, tara anusarana kare. Taderake'i allaha satpatha pradarsana karena ebam tara'i bud'dhimana.
Yara jan'ye sastira hukuma abadharita haye geche apani ki se jahannamike mukta karate parabena

kintu yara tadera palanakartake bhaya kare, tadera jan'ye nirmita rayeche prasadera upara prasada. Egulora taladese nadi prabahita. Allaha pratisruti diyechena. Allaha pratisrutira khelapha karena na.

Tumi ki dekhani ye, allaha akasa theke pani barsana karechena, atahpara se pani yaminera jharnasamuhe prabahita karechena, erapara taddbara bibhinna ranera phasala utpanna karena, atahpara ta sukiye yaya, phale tomara ta pitabarna dekhate pa'o. Erapara allaha take khara-kutaya parinata kare dena. Niscaya ete bud'dhimanadera jan'ye upadesa rayeche.

Allaha yara baksa isalamera jan'ye um'mukta kare diyechena, atahpara se tara palanakartara paksa theke agata alora majhe rayeche. (Se ki tara samana, ye erupa naya) yadera antara allaha smaranera byapare kathora, tadera jan'ye durbhoga. Tara suspastha gomarahite rayeche.

Allaha uttama bani tatha kitaba nayila karechena, ya samanjasyapurna, punah punah pathita. Ete tadera loma kamta diye uthe camarara upara, yara tadera palanakartake bhaya kare, erapara tadera camara o antara allahara smarane binamra haya. Eta'i allahara patha nirdesa, era madhyame allaha yake iccha patha pradarsana karena. Ara allaha yake gomaraha karena, tara kona pathapradarsaka ne'i.
Ye byakti keyamatera dina tara mukha dbara asubha ayaba thekabe ebam erupa jalemaderake bala habe, tomara ya karate tara sbada asbadana kara,-se ki tara samana, ye erupa naya
tadera purbabartira'o mithyaropa karechila, phale tadera kache ayaba emanabhabe asala, ya tara kalpana'o karata na.
Atahpara allaha taderake parthiba jibane lanchanara sbada asbadana karalena, ara parakalera ayaba habe ara'o gurutara, yadi tara janata
ami e kora'ane manusera jan'ye saba drstanta'i barnana karechi, yate tara anudhabana kare
arabi bhasaya e kora'ana bakratamukta, yate tara sabadhana haye cale.

Allaha eka drstanta barnana karechenah ekati lokera upara paraspara birodhi kayajana malika rayeche, areka byaktira prabhu matra ekajana-tadera ubhayera abastha ki samana? Samasta prasansa allahara. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
Niscaya tomara'o mrtyu habe ebam tadera'o mrtyu habe.
Atahpara keyamatera dina tomara saba'i tomadera palanakartara samane katha katakati karabe.
